properties.headline: SCHEDULED ROADWORK - BOLIVIA New England Highway at Bolivia Hill (32km south of Tenterfield)
properties.otherAdvice:
A 2.6km section of the highway at Bolivia Hill has been reduced to one lane to allow for road widening work.

Portable traffic lights are in place at the top and bottom of Bolivia Hill to ensure safe passage through and allow motorists to pass in one direction at a time. Delays up to 10 minutes can be expected.

There is also a three metre width restriction for oversize &/or overmass (OSOM) vehicles. Loads in excess of three metres wide need to contact the OSOM Road Access Unit on 1300 656 371.

Expected to remain this way until at least April 2020.

properties.headline: SCHEDULED ROADWORK - WARNERVALE Sparks Road at M1 Pacific Motorway on-ramp
properties.otherAdvice:
Traffic switch:  

New arrangements are now in place for motorists on Sparks Rd heading for either the M1 Pacific Mwy towards Newcastle, or Doyalson Link Rd towards Doyalson/Swansea.  

Westbound motorists on Sparks Rd use a new G-loop road to head north. The new G-loop joins a separated M1 northbound lane to merge with traffic that has come from Sparks Rd eastbound. 

Northbound traffic continues on the separated road and either travels left onto Doyalson Link Rd towards Doyalson/Swansea or right (under the overpass) to join the M1 Pacific Mwy towards Newcastle.

The lane configuration has changed for northbound motorists travelling from Sparks Rd on-ramp to either M1 Pacific Mwy or Doyalson Link Rd. Motorists should be prepared for changed merge conditions.

properties.headline: SCHEDULED ROADWORK - SLEEPY HOLLOW Pottsville Road
properties.otherAdvice:
• Motorists are advised of changed traffic conditions from next week on the Pacific Highway between Ballina and the Queensland border for vegetation clearing to be carried out around bridges.  
  • Vegetation clearing is done as part of regular highway maintenance and will be carried out from road shoulders where possible.  
  • For the safety of workers and motorists, one lane of the highway will occasionally be closed with traffic control and reduced speed limits in place.  
  • Work will be carried out between 7am and 5pm on weekdays and is expected to continue until the end of May, weather permitting.  
  • Motorists are advised to drive to the conditions, and follow the directions of signs and traffic control.   Transport for NSW thanks motorists for their patience during this time.  
  • For the latest traffic updates download the Live Traffic NSW App, visit livetraffic.com or call 132 701.

properties.headline: SCHEDULED ROADWORK - TYNDALE Pacific Highway at Ewingsdale to Tyndale.
properties.otherAdvice:
• Motorists are advised of changed traffic conditions from Sunday on the Pacific Highway for safety work to be carried out at a number of locations between Ewingsdale and Tyndale.  
  • To minimise impact to motorists, work will be carried out at night between 6pm and 3am from Sunday to Thursday over a two week period, weather permitting.  
  • Some lane closures will be in place while work is carried out to replace and repair guardrail.  
  • Traffic control and a reduced speed limit will be in place for the safety of workers and motorists.  
  • Motorists are advised to drive to the conditions, and follow the directions of signs and traffic control.  
  • Transport for NSW thanks motorists for their patience during this time.

properties.headline: SCHEDULED ROADWORK - ULMARRA Pacific Highway from Wells Crossing to Maclean
properties.otherAdvice:
• Traffic controllers are on site to direct motorists.
  • Wells Crossing to Glenugie Monday to Friday 7am to 6pm Sign installation/pavement repairs/barrier installation Mobile work
  • Glenugie, Franklins Road Thursday 11am to 2pm Rock blasting Intermittent stops both directions <10min
  • Glenugie, Franklins Road Tuesday and Wednesday 7am to 6pm Safety barrier installation Intermittent stops Southbound only
  • Glenugie, Lookout Rd Wednesday to Friday 7am to 6pm Barrier removal/line marking Intermittent stops Northbound only
  • Glenugie to Grafton Thursday 7am to 4pm Pavement repairs Mobile
  • Grafton to Maclean Wednesday 7am to 4pm Pavement repairs Mobile South Grafton Wednesday 6pm to 6am (night work) Line marking/sign installation One lane alternate

Additional changes to local roads  

  • From Monday, work will be carried out on the southbound on-ramp of the Yamba interchange including asphalting, line marking and building a concrete median.
  • A temporary detour will be in place for southbound motorists accessing the Pacific Highway from Yamba Road.  
  • Traffic control will be in place on Jubilee Street at Townsend and McIntyres Lane at Gulmarrad for six days from Monday to allow access to site and install signage.
  • Motorists can expect lane closures, a reduced speed limit if 40km/h and short stoppages at times between 6am and 6pm.  
  • There will be six days of work on Bondi Hill Road at Tyndale to carry out road maintenance and install signage.
  • Motorists can expect lane closures, traffic control and short stoppages at times between 7am and 6pm.  
  • The old Mororo Bridge is temporarily closed while drainage is installed.  
  • Motorists are advised to drive to the conditions and follow the direction of signs and traffic control. Transport for NSW thanks motorists for their patience during this time.
